# dependentParameters

**Instance Property**

Any other parameter’s whose values may change as a side effect of this parameter’s value changing.

## Declaration

```swift
var dependentParameters: [NSNumber]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] objects representing [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUParameterAddress] values.

## Querying Parameter Properties

- **minValue**: The parameter’s minimum value.
- **maxValue**: The parameter’s maximum value.
- **unit**: The parameter’s unit of measurement.
- **unitName**: The parameter’s localized unit name.
- **flags**: The parameter’s characteristic details.
- **address**: The parameter’s address.
- **valueStrings**: The parameter’s localized value strings.
title: dependentParameters
